name.el: Παιχνίδι εκτός σύνδεσης που γυρίζει μπουκάλι

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,de,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U: Play Bottle game right now. Discover the Joy of palying this game - Your Ultimate Online Happy Experience! Try it now!
short.da: Spil Bottle flipping Game lige nu. Oplev glæden ved at spille dette spil - din ultimative online glade oplevelse! Prøv det nu!
short.el: Παίξτε το παιχνίδι ανατροπής μπουκαλιού τώρα. Ανακαλύψτε τη χαρά να παίζετε αυτό το παιχνίδι - Η απόλυτη διαδικτυακή σας…
short.es: Juega al juego de voltear botellas ahora mismo. Descubre la alegría de jugar este juego: ¡tu mejor experiencia feliz en línea!…
short.et: Mängige pudeli viskamise mängu kohe. Avastage selle mängu mängimise rõõm – teie ülim õnnelik veebikogemus! Proovi seda kohe!
short.ja: 今すぐボトルひっくり返しゲームをプレイしてください。このゲームでプレイする喜びを発見してください - 究極のオンライン ハッピー エクスペリエンス!やってみよう！
short.ko: 지금 바로 병 뒤집기 게임을 즐겨보세요. 이 게임의 즐거움을 발견해보세요 - 최고의 온라인 행복한 경험을 즐겨보세요! 지금 사용해 보세요!
short.nl: Speel nu het flesflipspel. Ontdek het plezier van het spelen van dit spel: jouw ultieme online gelukkige ervaring! Probeer het nu!
short.tr: Hemen Şişe Çevirme Oyunu oyna. Bu oyunu oynamanın keyfini keşfedin - Nihai Çevrimiçi Mutlu Deneyiminiz! Şimdi dene!
short.vi: Chơi game lật chai ngay bây giờ. Khám phá niềm vui khi chơi trò chơi này - Trải nghiệm hạnh phúc trực tuyến đỉnh cao của bạn! Thử…
short.zh_CN: 立即玩翻转瓶子游戏。发现玩这个游戏的乐趣 - 您终极的在线快乐体验！现在就试试！
short.zh_TW: 立即玩翻轉瓶子遊戲。發現玩這個遊戲的樂趣 - 您終極的線上快樂體驗！現在就試試！

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introduction: Welcome to "Bottle Flipping Game"! This game brings you the challenge of bottle flipping. Bottle flipping is a popular activity where a plastic bottle filled with water is tossed upward, causing it to spin in the air and attempting to land it upright on a flat surface. It gained popularity worldwide in 2016 when many people started sharing videos of themselves flipping bottles online. Now, you can showcase your bottle flipping skills in the game and push your limits!

Key Features:

Flipping Skill Challenges: In "Bottle Flipping Game," you will face various flipping skill challenges. Use precise force and angle to toss the bottle into the air and try to make it spin and land stably on a flat surface. Challenge different distances, heights, and difficulties, improving your flipping skills and attempting more complex flipping actions!
Multiple Scene Selections: The game offers a variety of different scenes for you to choose from. You can take on bottle flipping challenges in indoor, outdoor, school, or other environments. Each scene has unique features and difficulties, providing you with more challenges and fun.
